Pre-Game Insights: The game between the Seattle Mariners and Los Angeles Angels is scheduled for Sunday, September 1, 2024, at Angel Stadium in Anaheim, CA.
The starting pitchers are expected to be Bryce Miller for the Mariners and Carson Fulmer for the Angels.
The Mariners have a team slugging percentage of .364 and have been called out on strikes 1,374 times, while being walked on 459 occasions.
The Mariners are recording 4.0 runs per outing, putting them at 26th in the league.
The Mariners' pitching staff has an earned run average of 3.50, which is 1st in the league.
The Mariners' pitching staff has a K/BB ratio of 3.78 and a collective WHIP of 1.09.
The Angels have a team batting average of .231 and an OBP of .303.
The Angels' pitching staff has a team ERA of 4.55 and a WHIP of 1.321.
The Angels' bullpen has a save percentage of 68.1%, which is 5th in the league.
